title: Under Apron
description: black pierced square on diagonal with small emboirdered rosette at point at bottom front; batik bib at top has two black ties and is attached with narrow pink horizontal strip; three squares with intricate geometric embroidery in white, gold, red, and some sequins at front bottom and sides with half diamond above; 3-1/2\" embroidered rosettes at center, two with beads and tassels; ties at sides
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
